parameter.scrapeOptions: (object) Additional options for scraping the search results

parameter.maxDepth: (number) Maximum recursive depth for the crawl
parameter.limit: (number) Maximum number of URLs to crawl

task.query: Start an asynchronous web crawl with advanced options

tools.name: firecrawl_extract
tools.description: Extract structured information from web pages using LLM capabilities.

parameter.urls: (array) List of URLs to extract information from
parameter.prompt: (string) Custom prompt for the LLM extraction
parameter.systemPrompt: (string) System prompt to guide the LLM
parameter.schema: (object) JSON schema for structured data extraction
parameter.enableWebSearch: (boolean) Enable web search for additional context

task.query: Extract structured data from web pages using LLM

tools.name: firecrawl_deep_research
tools.description: Conduct deep web research on a query using intelligent crawling, search, and LLM analysis.

parameter.query: (string, required) The research question or topic to explore
parameter.maxDepth: (number, optional) Maximum recursive depth for crawling/search (default: 3)
parameter.timeLimit: (number, optional) Time limit in seconds for the research session (default: 120)
parameter.maxUrls: (number, optional) Maximum number of URLs to analyze (default: 50)

task.query: Perform deep web research on a topic

tools.name: firecrawl_generate_llmstxt
tools.description: Generate a standardized llms.txt (and optionally llms-full.txt) file for a given domain.

parameter.maxUrls: (number, optional) Max number of URLs to include (default: 10)
parameter.showFullText: (boolean, optional) Whether to include llms-full.txt contents in the response

task.query: Generate standardized llms.txt files for a domain

tools.name: db_overview
tools.description: Get an overview (columns, row count, sample rows) for all tables within a specified database. Uses the table-level cache for each table unless refresh is true.

parameter.db: (string) Database name. Optional if STARROCKS_DB env var is set.
parameter.refresh: (Optional, boolean) Set to true to bypass the cache for all tables in the DB. Defaults to false.

tools.name: search
tools.description: Search DBLP for publications using boolean queries.

parameter.query: (string, required) A query string that may include boolean operators 'and' and 'or' (case-insensitive)
parameter.max_results: (number, optional) Maximum number of publications to return. Default is 10
parameter.year_from: (number, optional) Lower bound for publication year
parameter.year_to: (number, optional) Upper bound for publication year
parameter.venue_filter: (string, optional) Case-insensitive substring filter for publication venues (e.g., 'iclr')
parameter.include_bibtex: (boolean, optional) Whether to include BibTeX entries in the results. Default is false

task.query: Search for academic publications with boolean queries

tools.name: fuzzy_title_search
tools.description: Search publications with fuzzy title matching.

parameter.title: (string, required) Full or partial title of the publication (case-insensitive)
parameter.similarity_threshold: (number, required) A float between 0 and 1 where 1.0 means an exact match
parameter.max_results: (number, optional) Maximum number of publications to return. Default is 10
parameter.year_from: (number, optional) Lower bound for publication year
parameter.year_to: (number, optional) Upper bound for publication year
parameter.venue_filter: (string, optional) Case-insensitive substring filter for publication venues
parameter.include_bibtex: (boolean, optional) Whether to include BibTeX entries in the results. Default is false

task.query: Search publications by title with fuzzy matching

tools.name: get_author_publications
tools.description: Retrieve publication details for a specific author with fuzzy matching.

parameter.author_name: (string, required) Full or partial author name (case-insensitive)
parameter.similarity_threshold: (number, required) A float between 0 and 1 where 1.0 means an exact match
parameter.max_results: (number, optional) Maximum number of publications to return. Default is 20
parameter.include_bibtex: (boolean, optional) Whether to include BibTeX entries in the results. Default is false

task.query: Retrieve publications by author name with fuzzy matching

tools.description: Search for files and folders across the system. The search capabilities and syntax support vary by platform.

parameter.query: (required) Search query string. See platform-specific notes below.
parameter.max_results: (optional, integer) Maximum number of results to return (default: 100, max: 1000)
parameter.match_path: (optional, boolean) Match against full path instead of filename only (default: false)
parameter.match_whole_word: (optional, boolean) Match whole words only (default: false)
parameter.sort_by: (optional, integer) Sort order for results (default: 1). Available options: 1 (filename A to Z), 2 (filename Z to A), 3 (path A to Z), 4 (path Z to A), 5 (size smallest first), 6 (size largest first), 7 (extension A to Z), 8 (extension Z to A), 11 (creation date oldest first), 12 (creation date newest first), 13 (modification date oldest first), 14 (modification date newest first)
